[[inst_lw_add]]
==== LW.ADD

*Syntax:* lw.add<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Add operation: memory value is atomically added with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lw_add.svg[LW.ADD encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
